title: NotSpent ðŸ’°
meta_description: NotSpent is a design concept of an app for finance management & planning based on competitor research.
paragraph:
NotSpent is a small design project that I did as a one-week challenge. It's a concept of an app for finance management & planning. Based on competitor research. The main functionality includes:

â€¢ family budget management
â€¢ multiple cards & bank accounts
â€¢ savings & expense history
â€¢ categorized data

images.name: 20+ screens
images.description: With nearly 10 hours spent for a quick research, I used the remaining 20 hours to work on the UI

images.name: Spending by categories
images.description: The homescreen shows spendings by category with some useful info - budget alerts, spending frequency and more.

images.name: Savings & goals
images.description: A part of the app that allows you to lock some funds and save it toward some goal

images.name: Bank accounts & cards
images.description: Add your payment methods, and if needed, for your family. See the history of expenses and some other useful info.

images.name: Budget planning
images.description: A part of the app that allows you to lock some funds and save it toward some goal

images.description: A part of the app that allows you to lock some funds and save it toward some goal
